seed: To be honest, I'm a bit anxious.

casual_25.new_translation: Honestly, I'm feeling a bit anxious.
casual_25.reverse_translation: 正直、不安な気持ちが少しある。

casual_50.new_translation: Honestly, I'm getting a little anxious.
casual_50.reverse_translation: 正直、少し不安になってる。

casual_75.new_translation: I'm gettin' a little anxious, for real.
casual_75.reverse_translation: 本当に少し不安になってきた

casual_100.new_translation: I'm gettin' super anxious, for real.
casual_100.reverse_translation: めっちゃ不安になってきてる、本当。

polite_25.new_translation: Frankly speaking, I do feel a bit apprehensive.
polite_25.reverse_translation: 率直に言って、少し不安を感じます。

polite_50.new_translation: To be frank, I must admit that I'm somewhat apprehensive.
polite_50.reverse_translation: 正直に言わせてもらえば、私は少し不安に思っています。

polite_75.new_translation: Honestly, I have to say that I'm a bit on edge.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 正直に言わせてもらうと、少し不安な気持ちです。

polite_100.new_translation: I must confess that I am feeling somewhat apprehensive.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 正直に言わなければならないのですが、少し不安を感じています。

business_25.reverse_translation: 正直に言うと、少し気になっています。

business_50.reverse_translation: 率直に申し上げると、少し懸念しております。

business_75.new_translation: To be frank, I do have certain reservations.
business_75.reverse_translation: 率直に申し上げると、私にはいくつかの懸念があります。

business_100.new_translation: Frankly speaking, I harbor some minor concerns.
business_100.reverse_translation: 率直に申し上げると、私は若干の懸念を抱えております。

source: 今日は割と集中できた。
seed: I was able to concentrate pretty well today.

casual_25.new_translation: I managed to concentrate fairly well today.
casual_25.reverse_translation: 今日はそこそこ集中できた。

casual_50.new_translation: I did pretty well concentrating today.

casual_75.new_translation: I totally crushed it with concentration today.
casual_75.reverse_translation: 今日は集中力がすごくあった

casual_100.new_translation: I absolutely nailed it with focus today.
casual_100.reverse_translation: 今日は集中力を完全に発揮できた

polite_25.new_translation: I managed to concentrate fairly well today.
polite_25.reverse_translation: 今日はかなり集中することができました。

polite_50.new_translation: I was able to concentrate reasonably well today.
polite_50.reverse_translation: 今日はそこそこ集中できました。

polite_75.new_translation: I was able to concentrate quite effectively today.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 今日はかなり集中できました

polite_100.new_translation: I had the great fortune of being able to concentrate with considerable effectiveness today.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 今日はかなり効果的に集中することができました

business_25.new_translation: I managed to concentrate quite well today.
business_25.reverse_translation: 今日はかなり集中することができました。

business_50.new_translation: I was able to concentrate quite well today.
business_50.reverse_translation: 今日はかなり集中することができました。

business_75.new_translation: I was able to concentrate exceptionally well today.
business_75.reverse_translation: 今日はかなり集中できました

business_100.new_translation: I was able to concentrate with exceptional focus today.
business_100.reverse_translation: 今日は非常に集中することができました.

source: それはちょっとリスク高い。
seed: That's a bit of a high risk.

casual_25.new_translation: That poses a somewhat significant risk.
casual_25.reverse_translation: それはある程度重大なリスクをはらんでいる

casual_50.new_translation: That carries a pretty significant risk.
casual_50.reverse_translation: それはかなり大きなリスクです。

casual_75.new_translation: That carries a pretty hefty risk.
casual_75.reverse_translation: それはかなり大きなリスクです。

casual_100.new_translation: That carries a super hefty risk.
casual_100.reverse_translation: それはかなり高いリスクを伴う

polite_25.reverse_translation: それは少しリスクが高いですね

polite_50.new_translation: I would say that's somewhat high-risk.
polite_50.reverse_translation: それはややリスクが高いと言えるでしょう。

polite_75.new_translation: I would characterize that as moderately high-risk.
polite_75.reverse_translation: それを中程度のハイリスクと評します。

polite_100.new_translation: I would describe that as being at a moderately high level of risk.
polite_100.reverse_translation: それを中程度に高いリスクレベルであると説明いたします。

business_25.new_translation: There is a certain level of risk involved.
business_25.reverse_translation: ある程度のリスクが伴います。

business_50.new_translation: A certain level of risk is inherent in this situation.
business_50.reverse_translation: 一定のリスクが伴います

business_75.new_translation: There is an inherent level of risk present in this situation.
business_75.reverse_translation: この状況にはある程度のリスクが伴います。

business_100.new_translation: A considerable degree of risk is inherently associated with this situation.
business_100.reverse_translation: この状況にはある程度のリスクが伴う

source: それはあんまり現実的じゃない。

polite_50.reverse_translation: それは特に現実的ではないようです

polite_75.new_translation: It doesn't appear to be particularly realistic.
polite_75.reverse_translation: それは特に現実的ではないようです。

polite_100.new_translation: It does not seem to possess a particularly realistic quality.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 現実的であるとは思われません

business_25.reverse_translation: それはあまり現実的ではありません

business_50.new_translation: That does not seem entirely realistic.

business_75.new_translation: It does not appear to be entirely realistic.
business_75.reverse_translation: それは現実的ではないようです

business_100.new_translation: It does not seem to be fully realistic.

source: 今日ちょっといいニュースあった。
seed: I had some good news today.

casual_25.new_translation: I got some good news today.
casual_25.reverse_translation: 今日、良いニュースがあった。

casual_50.new_translation: I've had some great news today.
casual_50.reverse_translation: 今日、良いニュースがあった。

casual_75.new_translation: I've had some awesome news today.
casual_75.reverse_translation: 今日はすごくいいニュースがあった。

casual_100.new_translation: I got some sick news today.
casual_100.reverse_translation: 今日すごいニュースがあった

polite_25.new_translation: I had the pleasure of receiving some good news today.
polite_25.reverse_translation: 今日は良いニュースを聞くことができました.

polite_50.new_translation: It was my pleasure to receive some good news today.
polite_50.reverse_translation: 今日は良いニュースを受け取ることができてよかったです。

polite_75.new_translation: It was a delight to receive some good news today.
polite_75.reverse_translation: 今日は良いニュースをもらって嬉しかったです。

polite_100.new_translation: It is with great pleasure that I received some favorable news today.
polite_100.reverse_translation: 今日、良いニュースを頂戴できて大変嬉しく思います。

business_25.new_translation: I received some favorable news today.
business_25.reverse_translation: 今日、良いニュースがいくつかありました.

business_50.new_translation: I had the pleasure of receiving some favorable news today.
business_50.reverse_translation: 今日は良いニュースを受け取ることができました.

business_75.new_translation: It was my pleasure to receive some favorable news today.
business_75.reverse_translation: 今日はよいニュースを受け取ることができてよかったです。

business_100.new_translation: I am delighted to have received some favorable news today.
business_100.reverse_translation: 今日、好ましいニュースを受け取ることができて大変嬉しく思います。
